answers.answer: Hi! I'm on my 3rd pregnancy.. My second baby was born Sept 18 And this one will also be due in Sept 20! I have 2 boys and this time it's finally a girl. Husband and me can't decide on the name though
Yes im due 6th sept with my first. I am having a boy and we are calling him jenson alexander xx

I'm due Sept 25th with my second... Its a girl... My son was born Aug 8th, 2015... And I'm currently 28wks 2days... Congrats I pray you have q healthy, safe, and quick delivery... No name decided yet..

Exciting! I have my son and waiting on my daughter and I am done with babies for now lol. Im ready to loose all the baby weight. Thank you girl, you too. I'm just waiting to find out if the placenta moved away from my cervix. Definitely not to excited about possibly having a c section. I had my son vaginally and want to have my daughter the same.
Hi!! I'm due September 19th with my second. my first was born November 2nd and his name is Slaydon we do have a girl name picked but are keeping it secret until birth.

Second pregnancy for me! I'm having another baby boy who is due September 11th but I will be having a scheduled c section sometime to week before. Our first born is Dominic James and was born July 17th this baby boy will be named Thackery Jace

Hii!! Im on my Second pregnancy, but third baby! My first 2 were born on sept 26th.we named my daughter Mia and my son Aizen. This pregnancy im also due on sept 26th but will be having a c section on sept 21st. Were currently undecided on names because we cant agree on 1, but if it were up to me hed be named Noah. Goodluck to all september mommies on delivery day!
I'm due on September 7th with my first, a girl! Definitely ready for her to be here already
3rd pregnancy! Due Sept 12th. I have two boys and this one is a girl. Lilah Rosalea! :)
Congrats on all September mommies. I hope you have a safe, healthy and quick delivery.
This is my second child. I'm having another boy. He is due September 27th. We haven't decided on a middle name but his first name will be Aiden.
I am due Sept 5th with a boy. This is my first child. His name will be Milo.
I had my second child on sept 27 her name is shyanne-ocean and i currently pregnant again and due 23 sept with a boy have called him RJ-lewis

Im due September 25th with my second ( a little girl). My first was a boy born at 37 weeks in 2005 due to preeclampsia so a little nervous as the first pregnancy wasn't the best experience  as i had a emergency csection and my son wasnt breathing when he was born. I'm Still undecided if i want to have a natural or c-section birth.
Hello this is my second child and second girl she is due September 14th my husband and I change our minds on her name every month and this month it's Sariah
Hi, this is my first pregnancy,we are expecting a boy, im due september 14 ....i feel like weeks are just dragging by....no names as of yet :-S

question: Any mommies due in September? If so would love to know what your having and if you came up with any names? Also is this your first child.I'm currently on my second. My son  Angel Jadiel Hernandez was born September 30, 15 and currently pregnant with my daughter Morgan Jade Hernandez and she is due September 21, 16. Currently 28w 6d and definitely ready for my time to come.
title: September babies.
